It’s gonna get STICKIES!
You don’t just party with NCF in the club,
you get LIT wherever and whenever!
From 1 - 31 October, enjoy 5% off your NCF purchase!
CLICK HERE <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_MRT_1709_NCF_Stickies_Page---Registration-a.html?ASI_LUX_Gender__c_lead={{lead.Gender (L)}}&FirstName={{lead.First Name}}&LastName={{lead.Last Name}}&Email={{lead.Email Address}}&ASI_LUX_Birthday_Day__c={{company.Birthday (Day)}}&ASI_LUX_Birthday_Month__c={{company.Birthday (Month)}}&ASI_CRM_Birthday_Year__c={{lead.Birthday (Year)}}]]>
Party on with Martell NCF
If you can’t join us the 10. – 11.June for the Ultra Singapore, find our next Martell NCF Invasion Parties near you by following us on Facebook and be the first in the know
FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]>
Let's get rosy with Martell NCF
Sweet, fruity, smooth and creamy. Served with crushed rose petals on a bed of egg white foam, the Martell La Rose Emilie has a light cognac taste, with a hint of peach. A great start to a rosy night.
Martell La Rose Emilie 45ml Martell NCF 30ml French Rose Vanilla Tea 20ml Peach Juice 20ml Lemon Juice 1nos Egg White
